import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { formatPrice } from "../utils/helpers"; import AmountButtons from "./AmountButtons"; import { FaTrash } from "react-icons/fa"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCartContext } from "../context/cart_context"; const CartItem = ({ id, image, name, color, price, amount, company }) => { const { toggleAmount } = useCartContext(); const increase = () => { toggleAmount(id, "inc"); }; const decrease = () => { toggleAmount(id, "dec"); }; return (

Shopping Cart

  • {name}
    ${price}
 ); }; const Wrapper = styled.article` width: 100%; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; img.small { max-width: 7rem; width: 100%; } .cartname { color: black; font-weight: bold; } .itemprice { font-weight: bold; } .delete { color: white; outline: none; border: none; } .card { margin-top: 50px; margin-left: 5px; } .remove { outline: none; border: none; background: none; font-size: 25px; } .block { color: white; } .card { border: 1px solid black; padding: 20px; } } `; export default CartItem;
